perturbatr
  • Tutorial
  • Reference
  • News

Getter for a data set

Returns the data set that underlies an S4 wrapper class as tibble.

dataSet(obj)

# S4 method for AbstractAnalysedPerturbationData
dataSet(obj)

# S4 method for PerturbationData
dataSet(obj)

Arguments

obj

the object for which you want to extract the underlying data

Value

returns a tibble.

Examples

 data(rnaiscreen)
 dataSet(rnaiscreen)
#> # A tibble: 23,040 x 18
#>    Condition Replicate Plate RowIdx ColIdx GeneSymbol   ReadoutClass Readout
#>    <chr>         <dbl> <int>  <int>  <int> <chr>        <chr>          <dbl>
#>  1 V1               1.     1      1      1 c1qb         Readout         886.
#>  2 V1               1.     1      1      2 ifnb1        Readout        -246.
#>  3 V1               1.     1      1      3 ifna7        Readout        1136.
#>  4 V1               1.     1      1      4 dkfzp781d102 Readout        1200.
#>  5 V1               1.     1      1      5 lpar4        Readout        2864.
#>  6 V1               1.     1      1      6 rfx4         Readout        1213.
#>  7 V1               1.     1      1      7 cadm1        Readout        2885.
#>  8 V1               1.     1      1      8 lgr6         Readout        -259.
#>  9 V1               1.     1      1      9 tfap2c       Readout         835.
#> 10 V1               1.     1      1     10 adh6         Readout        -717.
#> # ... with 23,030 more rows, and 10 more variables: ReadoutType <chr>,
#> #   Control <int>, Library <chr>, Perturbation <chr>, Screen <chr>, Cell <chr>,
#> #   ScreenType <chr>, NumCells <int>, Design <chr>, Entrez <int>
